# 파일 로드
import os
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import seaborn as sns
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

train = pd.read_csv('../input/posmlstudy/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('../input/posmlstudy/test.csv')

# 한글폰트 설정
import matplotlib
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.font_manager as fm
import os

def change_matplotlib_font(font_download_url):
    FONT_PATH = 'MY_FONT'
    
    font_download_cmd = f"wget {font_download_url} -O {FONT_PATH}.zip"
    unzip_cmd = f"unzip -o {FONT_PATH}.zip -d {FONT_PATH}"
    os.system(font_download_cmd)
    os.system(unzip_cmd)
    
    font_files = fm.findSystemFonts(fontpaths=FONT_PATH)
    for font_file in font_files:
        fm.fontManager.addfont(font_file)

    font_name = fm.FontProperties(fname=font_files[0]).get_name()
    matplotlib.rc('font', family=font_name)
    print("font family: ", plt.rcParams['font.family'])

font_download_url = "https://fonts.google.com/download?family=Noto%20Sans%20KR"
change_matplotlib_font(font_download_url)
source.2a2cb581:
# 컬럼별 Data 분포 히스토그램
fig, ax = plt.subplots(nrows = 5, ncols = 5, figsize = (18, 20))
num = 0
ax = ax.flatten()
for col in list(train.columns[1:]):
    sns.distplot(train[col], ax = ax[num], kde = False, rug = True)
    num += 1    
plt.show()

plt.show()

# 상관관계가 높은 상위 10개 컬럼간 관계분석
top10_cols = train.corr()['허리둘레'].abs().sort_values(ascending=False).head(10).index.to_list()

plt.figure(figsize=(20,20))
sns.pairplot(train[top10_cols], palette="husl") # 1분 소요
